name: Sartorial
description: Make dressing up fun and challenge your creativity on a daily basis through this photo sharing platform.

name: Tidal
description: What if there was a way to reduce the impact of a tsunami? This project explores procedural design for an earthquake and tsunami evacuation.

name: Concerto
description: Concerto is a data visualization prototype. We take a look at the "ingredients" of a tour and see what it takes to make a top grossing concert.

name: Misfit Wearables Internship
description: During the Summer of 2015, I had the opportunity to work at Misfit Wearables as a user experience designer. Here's a sneak peek of some of the work I did during my internship.

name: Nomad
description: Skip the tedious process of planning your vacation and get an experience that is tailored to your taste.
